the simplification is over. Let's take a look at the result, that both players had previewed (i guess). White may appear as better coordinated as his bishop, his queen and potentially his other pieces are well oriented. But there is no direct threats on black and it just needs one move (the c8 bishop to be almost completely developped.
Computer says white has a slight advantage.
